attributes.action: with his cabinet to dress up as the village people and re-release YMCA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
well come on, it'd be funny wouldn't it?
it'd also be a chance for the government to show that they have a sense of humour and can really be in touch with the general public.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
